Class NxpHandset

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class NxpHandset
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the handset configuration & properties

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void enableMultiEvt_transactionReception​()
      Asks the system to inform "transaction events" to any authorized/registered components via BroadcastReceiver.
      Change SHALL not imply a power cycle and SHALL be valid until next handset reboot.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAvailableSecureElements​(int batteryLevel)  
      boolean getNxpProperty​(int feature)
      Return handset status for the following features HCI_SWP, MULTIPLE_ACTIVE_CEE FELICA, MIFARE_CLASSIC, MIFARE_DESFIRE, NFC_FORUM_TYPE3, OMAPI, BATTERY_LOW_MODE, BATTERY_POWER_OFF_MODE
      int getNxpVersion​()
      Return the version of device requirements supported.

      • getNxpProperty

        public boolean getNxpProperty​(int feature)

      • getAvailableSecureElements

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAvailableSecureElements​(int batteryLevel)

      • enableMultiEvt_transactionReception

        public void enableMultiEvt_transactionReception​()
        Asks the system to inform "transaction events" to any authorized/registered components via BroadcastReceiver.
        Change SHALL not imply a power cycle and SHALL be valid until next handset reboot.
